name: Dai-3-Ji Super Robot Taisen Alpha: Shuuen no Ginga e
name_original: Dai-3-Ji Super Robot Taisen Alpha: Shuuen no Ginga e
description: Dai-3-Ji Super Robot Taisen Alpha: Shuuen no Ginga e (第3次スーパーロボット大戦α 終焉の銀河へ) is a Tactical RPG video game published by Banpresto released on July 28th, 2005 for the PlayStation 2.
